question: I just came back from my eye Dr. visit, and was toldI have a bit of leakage and new swelling behind my eye.  My family is planning a trip over Thanksgiving, but I am concerned about the pressure on my eyes during the flight.  I have called my eye doctor's chief nurse, and he told mw without hesitating that I would be fine.  However, a friend of mine had presure behind her eyes as well, and her doctor told her not to fly.  I have Type I diabetes, and because of irresponsibility when I was a teenager, I now have slight vision problems.  I have tried getting through to talk directly to my doctor, but you know how that goes...any advice will be helpful.  Thanks!
title: Eye Pressure/Diabets/Flying
